text: Tapa'im tyasa (masjida)ma kahile pani na ubhinu. Tyasa baheka juna masjidako jaga nai prarambhadekhi allahako bhaktima adharita cha, tyo yasa yogya cha ki tapa'im tyasama ga'era ubhinus. Yasama yasta manisaharu chan jasale ki pavitra rahana ruca'umchan! Ra allahale pani pavitra rahaneharula'i prema gardacha
